page.title: 15River Tees at Yarm
page.content: {The Northumbrian Water Authority} have three targets for the river at Yarm. { Target 0ne}is to eliminate the smell, improve the appearance of the river and to increase the fish population. { Target two}is to make the river clean enough for the re establishment of the salmon which have to pass up the estuary and through Yarm to the upper non-tidal reaches. { Target three}is to return the river to the quality it enjoyed in{ {1920} before the expansion of the chemical industry. To reach this target would require a masive reduction in the pollution load discharged into the estuary down stream of Yarm. {Costs }of these targets are estimated to be: Target 1 30 million pounds Target 2 80 million pounds Target 3 230 million pounds.
